page.title: 11ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: {READING:}Few 11 year olds in the sample read much. Some do no reading at home unless specifically asked to do so;some read only comics. The minority who do read widely enjoy traditional favourites, from Black Beauty to The Hobbit with Enid Blyton's adventure stories by far the most popular. None had advanced or sophisticated tastes. {CINEMA:}This is slightly more popular than reading & the fact that the children from the scattered hamlets & villages are not able to to reach a cinema easily or cheaply is a reflection on how little reading they do.Favourite films are recent box office successes in Shrewsbury, Bridgnorth, Telford or Wolverhampton eg. Ghostbusters and Walt Disney classics.
